de.dfki.adom.rest.nodes

Class FeatureNegotiation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.restlet.Restlet
      • de.dfki.adom.rest.nodes.Component
        • de.dfki.adom.rest.nodes.FeatureNegotiation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.restlet.Uniform

    public class FeatureNegotiation
extends Component

    A Component to handle the feature negotiation of an object memory via the REST interface. It provides information about the memory's version and its storage and management nodes.

    Represents the "memory name" node in the REST tree and handles HTTP requests going there.

    Author:
    Christian Hauck
